summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4682 for the improvement of the alley in block 16, J.J. McGilvra's 2nd Addition, from East Prospect Street to East Highland Drive, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54277, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
